page.description: Defines the row validation behavior for the repeating section.
page.discussion: Specify if all repeating section rows should be validated or if only dirty rows in the repeating section should be validated.

item.name: AllRows
item.description: If this option is selected, all rows in a repeating section will be validated, including blank rows.

item.name: DirtyRowsOnly
item.description: If this option is selected, validation will only be applied to dirty rows in a repeating section.
